website_summaries.verdict: This flavorful and versatile formula can be enjoyed in a variety of ways – and tastes great, too.
pros: Not only is it packed with cold-pressed, organic greens and vegetables, but it has a creamy texture and tasty flavor
Powdered formula can be mixed with your favorite beverage
cons: Some users may prefer a pre-mixed cleanse

customer_reviews.title: Healthy...flavor just ok, but Id say Id buy again...
customer_reviews.text: Listen, its grass+etc, whoever says this taste good is nuts- mixing with apple juice isn't bad. However, there are some even better recipes to blend it in. Scoop of same product protein+this+coconut water+almond milk+1 banana and a few ice cubes is good. Add some carrots and even better. As for healthy effects, so far so good. Im not sure I have felt any magical tingling or anything, but Ill update in 30 days if anything new. I would say making greens part of your diet is good enough with a decent ability to drink and organic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wrong ingredients and no mfg info. Is that legal? Suspicious lack of info for food product.
customer_reviews.text: The specific contents are not disclosed on the label. In fact the contents of three other products were listed. How would the user know if the nutrition info is correct? Also the label does not disclose where the product is made. So I went to their website and also found no physical location or info of their manufacturing. I've never been more suspicious of a product and will never ingest this stuff. Amazon refunded money.
customer_reviews.author: doug n.

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste
customer_reviews.text: First off, I like the taste. I’d use these greens anyway, but that’s a bonus. I struggle to get enough vegetables sometimes, and time is often a factor. This an easy way to get all your greens for the day. I mix it with smoothies, or more often, just take it with one or two other powders. It’s organic (of course), and also alkalinizing. I keep one at home and one at work. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Jobilizer

customer_reviews.title: This greens powder has it all!
customer_reviews.text: Being pregnant I try to get in my daily serving of greens in a day but it’s always difficult. This powder makes it so easy, and it tastes delicious. It has spirulina so I know I’m getting some protein too which is super helpful as I’m doing a vegan pregnancy. I’ll definitely continue to drink after pregnancy too. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves well in water, pleasant taste!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is surprisingly pleasant! The powder dissolves completely in water which is a definite plus seeing as I have tried others that remain gritty in liquid. I have been using for three days now and I can already feel a difference with increased energy as well as feeling completely satisfied and not needing energy bars. All in all, I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Danny H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just started juicing with this product. It is great. Especially when you add some frozen fruits to help with the "grassy" taste. My digestive system loves it. So glad I started juicing with this product. It contains tons of good , organic greens. Read the label to see all of the nutritious ingredients. I add some broccoli powder, Macha power (green tea), and Pomegranate powder. I also add some essential oils (Turmeric) to my juice. I use a rice milk to mix it all together in my Magic Bullet mixer. I will be buying this product again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgustingly Sweet Rip-Off
customer_reviews.text: Why add flavoring to something that is supposed to be detoxing? I feel like I am doing something bad instead of good when I drink this. Disgustingly sweet taste. Twice as expensive as comparable products. I would return but item is not returnable. Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30% price increase during COVID - 19
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is OK, but their price increase during these hard times in unethical. I was going to make another purchase, but decided to go with another company.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome energy shift
customer_reviews.text: So based of the nutritional value alone I love this product its great which is why I chose to try this product, once I tasted the product it was good mixed in my green smoothie no after taste like some can leave, shipping was fast and definitely could feel an energy shift within a couple days of usuing.. I did a smoothie for breakfast and lunch and then had a "clean" dinner.. no afternoon sluggishness while at work when normal im sleeping around the 2/3pm mark.. So this is a win i definitely recommend trying this product as well as their other flavors such ad the pineapple chia... yummy 😋 😋
customer_reviews.author: rene

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves Great and Best Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I love fresh green juice, but our current living situation doesn't allow for us to use a juicer and store bought juices are expensive and full of sugar. We've tried a lot of powders and have never been able to finish any of those products because they tasted so bad and didn't dissolve well. This blend is GREAT! I mix a sprinkle of a Liquid IV hydration packet into water and add a scoop of Greens - shake shake shake. I do recommend shaking and letting the drink sit for a couple minutes to fully hydrate the powder. Tastes best cold. We're committed customers!
customer_reviews.author: Jen David

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel great
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat many vegetables at all, and even less now that this virus has us locked down and the cafeteria at work where I got most of my salads is no longer an option. I must have had a nutritional deficiency or something, because after the first cup of this, I felt better than I've felt in a long time. Not sure if everyone will have the same result, but if you don't get enough veggies, try this or a similar product. They work! The taste is OK, but I'm kind of lazy so I just mix it in water and drink it. It has grown on me, but in an actual smoothie I bet it would taste amazing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Carothers

customer_reviews.title: it's just OK
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good but took off two stars because it's WAY too sweet! I mix it with protein powder, egg whites and water each morning. Like drinking something with too much artificial sweetener. I'm going to try different concoctions but even by itself it's extremely sweet. Also the scooper included in the bottle has a handle that's so long it hardly fits in the bottle. I have to put it in handle-first, which makes a mess when I use it. I threw out the scoop and I'm using a teaspoon instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting green juice drink I have had so far. What I like about it is that it is grains and vegetables. I was looking for a drink without fruit. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Nafeesa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best greens out there!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried so many other greens and none compare! My kids and I drink this every morning. I use a smaller serving size than recommended and half that for my kids to maker it last. I use a frother to mix it into about 2-3oz of organic apple juice or orange juice and drink it like a shot. The aftertaste was a bit strong at first and we would wash it down with water, but after a week or so, we were used to it and no need for water!! We tried another kind that was sweeter but my kids (8&11) prefer this one! We love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Skillen

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting greens juice!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the way this greens juice tastes! I've tried others before, but I've always been so turned off by the grassy taste they had. I actually enjoy drinking this. You can smell it when you open the jar, and the apple taste really shines through when I make smoothies with it. In addition to being tasty, I love their ingredients because they really help me stay on track with healthy eating. I can sometimes struggle to get my vegetable servings in, and this always does the trick! I'd definitely recommend this greens juice to anyone who's struggled to find one that tastes great and works.
customer_reviews.author: Percy J.

customer_reviews.title: It's going too take a while to get use to the taste
customer_reviews.text: This is my first green juice. The taste is bitter. Ib can't mix it with just water or the taste turns me inside out. I as nice and fruit and the base taste is still over powering. Because this id's my first i think maybe it will take me sometime to get use to this kind of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: tania collins

customer_reviews.title: Makes healthy drinks fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many juices and powders in an effort to lose weight and gain energy and I have to say that Smart Pressed Juice takes it for taste! I giddily mixed this powder in my organic lemonade and it complemented the sour taste extremely well, giving it a refreshing undertone that is subtly sweet with a kick of tart. I can not wait to try it with other organic juices and reap the benefits of this win-win of taste and health!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick E Woo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t take the time to write many reviews. But this stuff is amazing. It’s def an acquired taste...but come on it’s organic vegetable juice with no added sugar so what are people expecting? I have felt so much more alert and energetic since I’ve started drinking this 3 times a day. It’s super convenient and a great way to do something good for your body!
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: Brown rice syrup solids? What the heck is that?
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that I did not read the nutrition information well enough before purchasing. It has 6 g of carbs only one of which is fiber and one of which is sugar. Not Keto friendly.
customer_reviews.author: CAL

customer_reviews.title: Very few vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I should have been concerned when I couldn't find much nutritional info about this product. I got it, and saw that there are very few nutrients per serving. It feels like false advertising when they tell you that a serving gives you all the vegetables you need. No. A salad gives you more vitamins than this product. It doesn't taste very good either. I'm using it in my green smoothie just to use it up. It's getting 2 stars instead of one because I'm willing to use it and see if I feel better while adding it to my usual green smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Scott

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I hated getting green juice in bulk only for it to expire after 7 days. I received this as a gift from my sister last month and had to repurchase because this is convenient and I have green juice for days!! it doesnt expire until next year so it has great shelf-life! It tasted pretty good with apple juice and my energy increased almost immediately! my skin is glowing and I feel so great! it's also one of the few green juice mix that have Spirulina, Chlorelia and ASHWANGHANDA all in one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesselle Jayleen

customer_reviews.title: Dented can
customer_reviews.text: The taste is fine and I was super excited to try this but what I'm super disappointed in is the container of it was dented and looks like it was rolled over multiple times. Luckily the seal was still sealed but the container looks absolutely horrible, I dont really get how they didnt notice this container when shipping it so I'm just going to assume they did notice and didnt care so would never repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Sweet - Have to Gag It Down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the Beet juice. Both are way too sweet even with "low sugar". The Beet juice tastes better than the Green juice, but I still have to gag both of them down due to the after taste. If they cut back on the sweetener then their products might be tolerable. Haven't really noticed a difference in energy either. I am now stuck with them because they are non-refundable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey H.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty greens!
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are amazing and it tastes pretty good. Looking at the ingredients I was a bit nervous to take my first sip.. but much to my surprise i didn't taste bad at all. It had an apple flavor to it. I mixed it with a spoon and it did still have some clumps but even the clumps of powder didn't taste bad at all. This is definitely the tastiest green powder I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: s.A.s

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste good at all
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves well in water or almond milk. But I have to chug it to get it down, even when I blend it with a banana and ice. It tastes and smells just like grass. Whoever thinks this tastes GOOD must not have many taste buds. I like all kinds of food, and am not picky, but it is not tasty at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, taste is decent.
customer_reviews.text: Taste is decent for this sort of thing and it’s easy to prepare. It’s more expensive then I’d like, and I wish they’d leave out unnecessary ingredients (like acacia gum), and include more pre and pro biotics, but other than that. It’s great and I’m on a monthly subscribe and save order plan.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened and unsealed
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived OPENED and UNSEALED. And is not eligible for return? Unacceptable. Total waste of money don’t risk it. There are plenty of other organic greens powder to choose from on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa & Justin

customer_reviews.title: Has a sweet taste
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a non-sweet tasting powder since it only has 1g of sugars (per nutrition label) and since I try to avoid sweet flavors when doing healthy things like drinking green drink powder, but this, unfortunately, has a very noticeable sweet taste. I am planning to return using the money-back guarantee, but either way, wanted to heads-up anyone else who might be trying to also avoid sweet drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L. Stericker

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Life has been taking quite a toll on me, and I haven't been taking the best care of myself. I used to have more time to make a smoothie every morning, but this has been a fantastic alternative to that. Having my fair share of green drinks, this is definitely one that tastes great, and I definitely feel a difference doing so on the regular. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a clean, tasty, and healthy add to their diet.
customer_reviews.author: N. Chou

customer_reviews.title: Do not like the taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the Beet and the Green. They do not taste like vegetable juice at all. A weird sweetness. Only on day 2 but so far have not noticed any extra energy. They do not give a sense of fullness like regular vegetable juicing does. IT IS NOT RETURNABLE, so be sure you want to try this.
customer_reviews.author: Ring My Dinner Bell

customer_reviews.title: Use nut milk instead of water!!
customer_reviews.text: I first followed the directions and mixed it with water -- It was unbearable!!! So the next day I decided to try it with a banana and used nut milk instead of water -- Delicious!!! They should really change the directions on the container and more people would love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Big results in a short time!!
customer_reviews.text: Since drinking this daily my stomach issues are settling down, I have more energy, less sugar cravings, and less appetite in general. The taste has taken some getting used to, but a small price to pay for the results.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A, JD, LMSW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix, easy to drink
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to supplement my diet. I do enjoy the junk food from time to time. Figured this was an easy way to make sure I get some veggies in and I was correct. Decent taste, kind of sweet to me. I mix some up every morning and down the hatch it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin G.

customer_reviews.title: Part of my morning routine now
customer_reviews.text: I blend the vanilla protein powder, green powder, almond milk and ice. I change it daily by adding banana, frozen fruit, and/or cacao powder. My favorite weekday breakfast. I appreciate the quality ingredients and that they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMom

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Was tried of buying spinach and kale to juice and looking for a quality product to provide my greens. This definitely does it! Mixed with unsweetened almond or coconut milk and protein powder this provides a great alternative and fits well for my intermittent fasting plan.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn English

customer_reviews.title: Actually Organic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This juice flawlessly replaced my former cold pressed juice daily intake. This product delivers the same health and gastrointestinal benefits as the former product , but is much more affordable ! I typically use 1/2-1 scoop 5-6 days a week and the container lasts me about 1.5-2 months. I love that I can use the powder in various smoothies or have it alone with water, because it actually has a pleasant/ lightly sweetened (monk fruit) flavor that blends well with others . I actually cannot wait to try more products by Smart pressed Juice
customer_reviews.author: Maraya Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: If you're serious about your health
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking my organic green for a solid month now and all I can say is where has this been all my life! I struggled with getting my "green nutrients" but this solved the trick. This truly has been a lifestyle change for me personally and feel so much better because of it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hector0fTr0y

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awful
customer_reviews.text: I could not choke this down. I didn't expect it to taste like a rich milkshake, but the smell and taste repulsed me. I contacted the seller to see if I could swap out for another flavor, but no response. Repulsive.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients on this product and that it is certified organic. I ended up using it in a green smoothie with almond milk, bananas, and blueberries and it was pretty good. It does have a pretty “green” after taste so we only used two scoops for our 3 serving smoothie. The smoothie ended up great, my three year old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes 100% and stays even after sitting.
customer_reviews.text: Mixes easy and stays mixed. Has a pleasant fresh veggies smell Soft fine texture not dirt and grass. Best of 100 brands i have tried. We will see if i order #2....
customer_reviews.author: chad knox

customer_reviews.title: Getting my greens the easy way
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great! Quickly dissolved with my fruit juice just by stirring. Love that it’s all organic. Also like that there is only 1g of sugar per serving.
customer_reviews.author: Raph

customer_reviews.title: Must be use in smoothies!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that I would be able to mix this powder in a shot or two of water and take it as my morning tonic...wrong. This is not that kind of powder mix. It dissolves easily but does not taste very good on it's own. In smoothies it is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the body good, good for you
customer_reviews.text: Every time I open it it smells like fresh vegetables ready to eat. I've been on and used Many superfoods for a long time and this is the first one that smells like the real thing it also tastes good I can drink it alone not having to add something for taste thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Not

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product mostly because it has a good taste compared to other "green " supplements. It mixes easily and makes me feel good. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I drink this mixed with my protein shake daily! To my surprise, it mixes perfectly and tastes delicious. I can feel an improvement in attitude and energy throughout the day. Truly love this stuff! I am on my third container and have shared/recommended with others who agree it is surprisingly delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: fabulous mix, loaded with nutrients, easy to put into your smoothie.
customer_reviews.text: i added this to my smoothies and it tastes fabulous. it is loaded with veggies and very healthy - the best part is the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet but okay with lemon
customer_reviews.text: It’s way too sweet. I add lemon juice and make it a green lemonade which taste okay. It’s still a better value than the juice in stores
customer_reviews.author: Charlie 2 times 2 times

customer_reviews.title: ... one to say that this stuff does NOT taste good at all
customer_reviews.text: I hope I’m not the only one to say that this stuff does NOT taste good at all. I’m not a very picky eater and would try almost everything. But this green juice... I don’t know, but I find it repulsive. After forcing it down, I had to drink something else to take the taste off of my mouth. It lingered... and the smell of the powder is enough to make me gag. My husband is always supportive of all things healthy that I do, but even he had to tell me to stop drinking this one. He’s seen how much I hated it! Lol but hey, if you like it, good for you! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jayzebel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Veggies intake For Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this product. I’m pregnant with my first child and I’ve always loved veggies but during my pregnancy oddly one of my aversions were literally all vegetables. Don’t like them, any of them! I was nervous that my growing baby was not receiving the nutrients provided through vegetables and Pressed Greens juice fulfilled that need - without having to actually eat veggies with each meal.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiyana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tastes vile
customer_reviews.text: Super healthy. Mixes good. Tastes like broccoli and vomit had a baby. Made me gag.
customer_reviews.author: The Eck

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many green juice powders and this tastes the best by far. Pricey but worth it when you can’t get your greens in!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: does not taste so good in water - better in milk blended with ice - have not tried in any juices but I do enjoy knowing that I'm putting something healthy in my body for a change. Probably a good way to sneak veggies into your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was so surprised at how good this tasted. I usually have green products that do not taste as good and I have to chug fast without trying to taste the flavor. Total opposite here. Thanks for making this product!
customer_reviews.author: William Peddie

customer_reviews.title: mixes great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I was able to "hide" the greens in a smoothie from my 2 picky eater kids. They had no clue. Love the smoothness and its ability to mix!!
customer_reviews.author: Kdeb831

customer_reviews.title: Good veg powder, nutritional and energy efficient, wish I could find one without grasses though
customer_reviews.text: Taste is strange( I am guessing thanks to ashwaganda) but blend is invigorating. A bit harsh on the stomach due to grass blend (people are not cows, 4 stomachs not included)but appreciate nutritional value of vege ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Belle Grossarth

customer_reviews.title: Great benefits, bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is nice. I believe the overall benefits from this product are great but the taste is pretty bad. It is better with juice but only slightly. I basically just chug it down.
customer_reviews.author: CFS1985

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was unsure due to the taste but then I tried a few things and ended up mixing it with Almond Milk and 1/2 Banana and it came out just fine, I like it now. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Tastes very good and has all the ingredients I want in a green juice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Actually very fresh tasting!
customer_reviews.text: I am just on week one of using the powder mixed into my morning smoothie (non sweetened almond milk, fresh blueberries, 1/2 banana, shot of collagen powder and crushed ice in the blender) and it tastes very clean and fresh, with a slight minty taste. I think the ingredients look great, so I plan to stick with this regime every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: the taste is so pleasnt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to try to get more greens in my life and to boost my immunity. I was surprised by the pleasant taste with this product. there is no chaulky residue that you find in most green powder drinks. I will be adding this into my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dias

customer_reviews.title: Simpler Way
customer_reviews.text: This comes in handy when you think you don't consume enough vegetables. The Favor is probably the only thing that I would change yet eating your vegetables aren't always the best of tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer11

customer_reviews.title: I like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: It's my first green powder. I might buy a different brand just to compare flavors if I see one at a reasonable price. I like the flavor. I don't need to camouflage the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Mali

customer_reviews.title: It really helps to make digestion faster
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product...I could see the the texture of the greens are much thicker compare to other lower priced products which they added flavoring and some even added proteins to make u gain muscle .. I recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Hung Chi Lin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my morning smoothies. It is delicious and saves me from buying fresh vegetables that often tend to rot before I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Editpro45

customer_reviews.title: Stomach couldn’t handle it
customer_reviews.text: It tasted great and I was looking forward to the health benefits however, it gave me the worst stomach pain and diarrhea! I was literally in agony. Thinking it may have been something else I waited a week and tried at again. Same thing. Not sure if my batch was defective? I’m throwing the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: cathy lillard

customer_reviews.title: Good for you and yummy!
customer_reviews.text: For Pressed greens, this actually tastes really good! Even my 8 yr old son will drink it. Great organic green drink!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Veggie Powder
customer_reviews.text: The variety of greens in the powder is awesome- it’s super natural and very helpful for people like me who are on the go but still want a good source of daily veggies. The taste is a little strong- that’s just how veggies are- so I would mix it with a smoothie or some food to help it go down better but overall it’s an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hentish

customer_reviews.title: EXTRA GREENS GREAT TASTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect in my daily smoothie! I love knowing I'm getting all the extra greens in that I wouldn't normally buy in the store like alfalfa and wheatgrass etc. Sometimes I mix it with my bcaas and it taste great! Will continue to buy these products also love love love the beet powder one!❤️
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best greens with the best quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best greens that I have tried and the quality of the ingredients are like no other! I mix one scoop with a flavor packet and I crave this every morning now. This is a consistent order for me now 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: The Vapor Depot 155

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: For what it is it doesn’t smell too bad. Most things that taste really good are bad for you. I mix it with 12 ounces of coconut milk. Doesn’t taste bad at all. Hopefully it’s as good for me as it says.
customer_reviews.author: Construction dude

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Taste good but has stomach ache taking it. So not sure
customer_reviews.author: Hded

customer_reviews.title: The organic greens are good, better than other veggie juices that I've tried ...
customer_reviews.text: The organic greens are good, better than other veggie juices that I've tried before. Having it in a powdered form let's you have options with what you're mixing it with, which makes a big difference if you can find something really good that you can pair it with.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Bales

customer_reviews.title: A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I never have enough vegetables in my diet and this is a great benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great juice!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a handful of “green” juices. This really is the best!! It tastes great and dissolves w/no clumps fast! I’ve only had two servings so far so I can’t speak on behalf of its health benefits but it’s a great product. I believe after finishing it I’m getting all the greens I’m missing in my life. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Best green's on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have tired several different greens and this is my favorite by far, it taste good. Nails, hairs skin, stomach... the list goes on of thing's that have improved.
customer_reviews.author: Justin & Ashlie B.

customer_reviews.title: It is as described.
customer_reviews.text: It is the best testing green drink smoothie I Have had so far. I added frozen fruits and veggies and OMG what an amazing way to start my morning! No pics! Sorry. I reviewed after drinking the Green.
customer_reviews.author: Summer1970

customer_reviews.title: I strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am five days in and I am already feeling the benefits and actually crave it during the day. The first day or 2 I was a bit off and dizzy at times. But that passed and now I feel the energy increase and my over well being improve as well as a reduction in the stress I feel. Love it!

product_meta.title: Smart Pressed Organic Greens Superfoods Juice Powder Single Serving Cold-Pressed Vegan Alkalizing Green Juice Cleanse Detox (Original, 30 Servings Bottle)
feature_bullets: 🏆AWARD-WINNING ORGANIC GREENS POWDER: Triple award-winning green juice powder- Top Superfoods by Vegan Health & Fitness Magazine, People’s Choice Award at BevNET New Beverage Showdown and California Toro Shark Tank Winner. Doctor-approved and recommended.

🥦DAILY DOSE OF VEGETABLES: Get an entire farmer’s market in your glass with 22 USDA certified organic whole & cold-pressed greens including kale, spinach, wheatgrass, broccoli, beets, celery, lemon, dandelion, triphala, spirulina, cracked cell chlorella, ashwagandha and aloe with only 1g of naturally-occuring sugar!

⏳RESULTS YOU CAN SEE & FEEL: Get that just-juiced feeling every day with cold pressed raw wheatgrass, barley grass and alfalfa juice powders, which deliver 6x more alkalizing greens than common green powders for more energy and vitality. Vegan enzymes and probiotics to ensure you absorb every last drop of vitamins, minerals and nutrients.

💩HEALTHY DETOX & CLEANSE: Enjoy the benefits of a triple-action superfood greens juice- natural weight loss, glowing skin, immunity boost, relaxation, better sleep and optimal digestion and gut health from vegetables, adaptogens, probiotics and enzymes.
🌱ORGANIC CLEAN LABEL GUARANTEE: USDA Certified Organic, Non-GMO, Vegan, Kosher, Soy-Free, Gluten-Free, No Artificial Ingredients, No Added Sugar, No Sugar Alcohol, No Fillers.
